item.description:
https://t.co/fZ9QhlsLk2 is a terrific secure video-conferencing #alternative to #Zoom and obviously comes with all the open-source awesomeness. Call clarity is amazing and with a room capacity of 75 users, it’s an absolute no-brainer to switch over. …| https://t.co/5m7OC73PvV
